description: Lists GuardDuty findings statistics for the specified detector ID. You must provide either findingStatisticTypes or groupBy parameter, and not both. You can use the maxResults and orderBy parameters only when using groupBy. There might be regional differences because some flags might not be available in all the Regions where GuardDuty is currently supported. For more information, see Regions and endpoints.

parameters.name: DetectorId
parameters.description: The ID of the detector whose findings statistics you want to retrieve. To find the detectorId in the current Region, see the Settings page in the GuardDuty console, or run the ListDetectors API.

parameters.name: FindingStatisticTypes
parameters.description: The types of finding statistics to retrieve. (string) ---

parameters.name: FindingCriteria
parameters.description: Represents the criteria that is used for querying findings. Criterion (dict) --- Represents a map of finding properties that match specified conditions and values when querying findings. (string) --- (dict) --- Contains information about the condition. Eq (list) --- Represents the equal condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings. (string) --- Neq (list) --- Represents the not equal condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings. (string) --- Gt (integer) --- Represents a greater than condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings. Gte (integer) --- Represents a greater than or equal condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings. Lt (integer) --- Represents a less than condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings. Lte (integer) --- Represents a less than or equal condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings. Equals (list) --- Represents an equal  condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings. (string) --- NotEquals (list) --- Represents a not equal  condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings. (string) --- GreaterThan (integer) --- Represents a greater than condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings. GreaterThanOrEqual (integer) --- Represents a greater than or equal condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings. LessThan (integer) --- Represents a less than condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings. LessThanOrEqual (integer) --- Represents a less than or equal condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings.

nested_params.name: Criterion
nested_params.description: Represents a map of finding properties that match specified conditions and values when querying findings.

nested_params.name: Eq
nested_params.description: Represents the equal condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings.

nested_params.name: Neq
nested_params.description: Represents the not equal condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings.

nested_params.name: Gt
nested_params.description: Represents a greater than condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings.

nested_params.name: Gte
nested_params.description: Represents a greater than or equal condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings.

nested_params.name: Lt
nested_params.description: Represents a less than condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings.

nested_params.name: Lte
nested_params.description: Represents a less than or equal condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings.

nested_params.name: Equals
nested_params.description: Represents an equal  condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings.

nested_params.name: NotEquals
nested_params.description: Represents a not equal  condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings.

nested_params.name: GreaterThan
nested_params.description: Represents a greater than condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings.

nested_params.name: GreaterThanOrEqual
nested_params.description: Represents a greater than or equal condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings.

nested_params.name: LessThan
nested_params.description: Represents a less than condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings.

nested_params.name: LessThanOrEqual
nested_params.description: Represents a less than or equal condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings.

parameters.name: OrderBy
parameters.description: Displays the sorted findings in the requested order. The default value of orderBy is DESC. You can use this parameter only with the groupBy parameter.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to be returned in the response. The default value is 25. You can use this parameter only with the groupBy parameter.

nested_items.name: FindingStatistics
nested_items.description: The finding statistics object.

nested_items.name: CountBySeverity
nested_items.description: Represents a list of map of severity to count statistics for a set of findings.
(string) ---
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: GroupedByAccount
nested_items.description: Represents a list of map of accounts with a findings count associated with each account.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: LastGeneratedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the finding for this account was last generated.

nested_items.name: TotalFindings
nested_items.description: The total number of findings associated with an account.

nested_items.name: GroupedByDate
nested_items.description: Represents a list of map of dates with a count of total findings generated on each date per severity level.

nested_items.name: Date
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the total findings count is observed.

nested_items.name: LastGeneratedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the last finding in the findings count, was generated.

nested_items.name: Severity
nested_items.description: The severity of the findings generated on each date.

nested_items.name: TotalFindings
nested_items.description: The total number of findings that were generated per severity level on each date.

nested_items.name: GroupedByFindingType
nested_items.description: Represents a list of map of finding types with a count of total findings generated for each type.

nested_items.name: FindingType
nested_items.description: Name of the finding type.

nested_items.name: LastGeneratedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which this finding type was last generated in your environment.

nested_items.name: TotalFindings
nested_items.description: The total number of findings associated with generated for each distinct finding type.

nested_items.name: GroupedByResource
nested_items.description: Represents a list of map of top resources with a count of total findings.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: LastGeneratedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the statistics for this resource was last generated.

nested_items.name: ResourceId
nested_items.description: ID associated with each resource. The following list provides the mapping of the resource type and resource ID.
AccessKey - resource.accessKeyDetails.accessKeyId.
Container - resource.containerDetails.id.
ECSCluster - resource.ecsClusterDetails.name.
EKSCluster - resource.eksClusterDetails.name.
Instance - resource.instanceDetails.instanceId.
KubernetesCluster - resource.kubernetesDetails.kubernetesWorkloadDetails.name.
Lambda - resource.lambdaDetails.functionName.
RDSDBInstance - resource.rdsDbInstanceDetails.dbInstanceIdentifier.
S3Bucket - resource.s3BucketDetails.name.
S3Object - resource.s3BucketDetails.name.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The type of resource.

nested_items.name: TotalFindings
nested_items.description: The total number of findings associated with this resource.

nested_items.name: GroupedBySeverity
nested_items.description: Represents a list of map of total findings for each severity level.

nested_items.name: LastGeneratedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which a finding type for a specific severity was last generated.

nested_items.name: Severity
nested_items.description: The severity level associated with each finding type.

nested_items.name: TotalFindings
nested_items.description: The total number of findings associated with this severity.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination parameter to be used on the next list operation to retrieve more items.
